pages.text: $(li)Carrots can be planted in farmland to obtain more Carrots.$(br)$(li)They can be used to feed $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pig)Pigs$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can put Carrots in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).

$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/farmer)Farmers$(/l) will exchange your Carrots by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use Carrots to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/quark/carrot_crate)Carrot Crate$(/l), $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Snowman Lanterns$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/carrot_on_a_stick)Carrot on a Stick$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_carrot)Golden Carrots$(/l), $(l)Adzuki Stew$(), $(l)Adzuki Curry$() and $(l)Rabbit Stew$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
